Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Requires a criminal history report for certain employment or volunteer applicants to the office for people with developmental disabilities
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the office for people with developmental disabilities to deny employment or volunteer applications based on a criminal history report for such applicant.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Ment Hyg L; amd ยง837, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the executive law, in relation to directing the commissioner of developmental disabilities to promulgate regulations authorizing the denial or disapproval of certain employment or volunteer applications following a criminal history report for such applicant
